alert.note: Alert for Clay; Early (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 4:28PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Henry, northeastern Houston, western Clay and northwestern Early Counties through 515 PM EDT/415 PM CDT/... At 428 PM EDT/328 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles east of Richards Crossroads to 6 miles south of Blakely. Movement was southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Abbeville, Fort Gaines, Blakely, Columbia, Centerville, Haleburg, Shorterville, Walter F. George Lock And Dam, Walter F George Lake, Edwin, Standleys Store, Hayes, Scottsboro Crossroads, Double Bridges, Rock Hill, Graball, Thomas Mill Creek, Farley Nuclear Plant, Fort Gaines-Clay Airport and Hilton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
